name: hy-drawer
description: A touch-enabled drawer component for the modern web

scripts.build: mkdir -p lib && find src -name '*.js' -exec cp {} lib \; && tsc -d --outDir lib
scripts.watch: mkdir -p lib && find src -name '*.js' -exec cp {} lib \; && tsc -d --outDir lib -w
scripts.postversion: sed -i '' 's:#/dist:/dist:' .gitignore && git rm --cached -r dist && git add . && git commit -m 'restore preversion .gitignore'

author: Florian Klampfer <mail@qwtel.com> (https://qwtel.com/)
